message.content: This question requires basic knowledge about electrical appliances and their functions. A table fan is able to keep things cool thanks to electrical conversion. When the fan is turned on, electricity powers the motor inside the fan, causing the blades to spin. As the blades move, they create airflow that helps to evaporate sweat from our skin, making us feel cooler. Option (A) is incorrect because a magic carpet does not rely on electrical conversion to keep things cool. Option (B) is unrelated to electrical conversion. Option (C) is incorrect because a light bulb produces light, not cooling effects.

Option (B) is incorrect because a snowy road does not rely on electrical conversion to maintain cool temperatures. Option (C) is incorrect because a light bulb converts electrical energy into light and heat, not cool air.
